meanings.definition: A human being of either sex; a person.
meanings.sent1: The young man helped his neighbor carry groceries.
meanings.sent2: Every man and woman should have equal rights.
meanings.sent3: The man in the funny hat danced like nobody was watching.
meanings.sent4: She was a strong woman, a man in her own right.
meanings.sent5: The man and woman held hands as they walked along the beach.

meanings.definition: A member of the species Homo sapiens, distinguished from other animals by superior mental development, power of articulate speech, and upright stance.
meanings.sent1: As a man, he pondered the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent2: Every man has the capacity for great achievements.
meanings.sent3: The man in the lab coat mixed potions like a wizard.
meanings.sent4: She was a woman of science, but a man of philosophy.
meanings.sent5: The man's intelligence shone through in every conversation.
